attributes.action: Cancer patients should get winter fuel allowance
attributes.additional_details:
Many Cancer patients cannot afford to heat their homes which has and adverse affect on their health and can undo health treatments.

We want to petition the government to ask for winter fuel allowance for cancer patients.  This can be done same as providing the free prescriptions so the administration should be limited and not cost the government much to introduce I terms of administration.

It's not nice being ill at home and too frightened to put the heating on.
